name: The Search For Paradisus
description:
You are in a place called “Purgatorium”, a labyrinth-shaped prison. Why are you there? A mysterious being called “Mr. Nobody” introduces himself and says his goal is to get to “Paradisus”. However, he doesn't care if you make it, but, he's the only help you have. Will you make it to “Paradisus”? And who is “Mr. Nobody"?

Explore the labyrinth of “Purgatorium” and follow the instructions of “Mr. Nobody”. There are few dangers in “The Search For Paradisus”. But, there is also no way to recover your lost health, so be careful, because there are worse places than “Purgatorium” and death will take you there.

Gameplay:

In 3D Platform style with simple mechanics such as: walk, run, jump and ultra speed.



Collection of key items for map and story progression.



Hidden walls and traps.
